message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can have a smaller share, but I'll give you a chance to get something.
I'll give you a slightly larger share, but I'm not going to give up too much!
You're getting desperate, so I'll give you a tiny bit, but don't expect much.
I'm not getting desperate yet, but I'm not going to give you all the power either!
You're running out of time, take it or leave it, but don't expect any more mercy!
I'm not going to give up yet, I'm going to try to take control of this negotiation!
You're getting close to losing everything, take the tiny amount and be done with it!
I'm making a last-ditch effort to take control of this negotiation. Accept or regret it!
You're out of options, take the last crumbs and admit defeat!
This is my last chance. Accept or I walk away with nothing!
You're out of time, take it or leave it, I'm not negotiating further!
